{"id":1238703412,"question_id":50,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1713755582,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1238703412/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"41.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n\n        if(n==0) return 1;\n        if(n==1) return x;\n\n        if(n==Integer.MIN_VALUE){\n            x = x*x;\n            n =n/2;   \n        }\n\n        if(n<0){\n            n=-n;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n\n\n        if(n%2==0){\n            return myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        }else{\n            return x * myPow( x*x  ,n/2);\n        }\n\n\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
